title: Entertainment Live: All Saints release video; BBC Music app launches - BBC News
summary: artist phyllida barlow to represent uk in venice .
all saints release comeback music video .
mumford and sons to headline hyde park gig .

documents.title: that 's all we 've got time for
text: it 's time to wrap things up here - but if you 're just joining us , do n't worry .
you can scroll down for all of the day 's news .
and , of course , we 'll be back bright and early on monday morning to start off a brand new week .
we 'll leave you with this inspirational mural that 's cropped up in los angeles .
it comes days after leonardo dicaprio finally became the proud owner of an oscar - on his sixth attempt - winning best actor for the revenant .
we wo n't leo , we wo n't

documents.title: madonna promises 'performance art , comedy and music ' for one-off show
text: madonna is going to take part in a one-off show as she heads to australia for the next leg of her rebel heart tour .

the tears of a clown show - tickets for which will be given to winners of a competition - will take place on 10 march at melbourne 's forum theatre and has been billed as a mixture of music , art and comedy .

in a statement on her website , madonna said : `` i wanted to do something special for australia because you have been so patient and waited so long - the 'tears of a clown ' show will make its debut on march 10 .
`` performance art , comedy , story telling and music of course !
especially for you my rebel heart fans down under . ''
she posted a short clip on twitter too , showing herself , well , clowning around on stage .
but how will the comedy element work ?
well , we do n't know what it 's going to involve yet .
we do know that madonna has previously admitted to being a `` closet comedian '' , making her stand-up comedy debut last year on the tonight show starring jimmy fallon .
in the short routine , she poked fun at herself - and her habit of dating younger men .
you can watch it below .
read more .

documents.title: holographic stage epic to premiere in london
text: how do you put 250 actors and dancers on stage alongside a full choir and a symphony orchestra ?
one way is to make them all holograms .
that 's what south african-born composer and director adam donen has done for his e to a lost generation .
described as the world 's first fully holographic production '' , it fuses classical music , dance , drama and archival film to de the human tragedy of the first world war .
the show has its world premiere at lso st lukes in east london on 28 may .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: keanu reeves shooting practice goes viral
text: its odd which videos go viral is n't it ?
a short video of keanu reeves at a shooting range has had more than 750,000 views on youtube .
it reminds us a little bit of the first scene in point break , but without the dramatic rain .
apparently keanu 's been training for his upcoming role in the movie john wick : chapter two , which is due out in 2017 .

documents.title: gladys knight sings happy birthday to police officer after he stops car in which she is travelling
text: when utah police officer paul rogerson pulled over a speeding car , he ended up with an unexpected birthday surprise - being serenaded by gladys knight .
the midnight train to georgia singer was a passenger in the car .
when the driver said she was with knight , officer rogerson said he and his wife - who was in the car with him - were big fans .
gladys got out of the car to sing happy birthday and even posed for a photograph with the couple .
the officer let the driver go with a warning - with pleasant grove police captain mike roberts saying this would have happened even if the music star had not been in the car .
the grammy award-winning singer was in utah for a choir rehearsal .

documents.title: i 'm in awe of louisa durrell , says keeley hawes
text: actress keeley hawes has been speaking about her starring role in itv 's forthcoming drama the durrells .
based upon gerald durrell 's trilogy of corfu memoirs - including my family and other animals - the six-part series will be shown next month .
hawes plays louisa durrell , a widow with four children in 1930s bournemouth , who decides to uproot and move her family to the sun-drenched greek island .
speaking at a preview screening of the first episode on friday , hawes said :
i often think what a massive undertaking it actually was for louisa .
everything about what she did is quite extraordinary , particularly being a mother on her own in the 1930s .
there was no easyjet , nothing to make her life any smoother going into this huge journey and taking four children and a dog and all their worldly possessions across the world .
it 's a massive undertaking and so brave and i 'm in awe that she did that .
asked about the mild swearing that appears in the series , written by men behaving badly 's simon nye , hawes said it meant the drama would n't appear `` saccharine '' .
it 's not something that would make me turn over if my children were watching .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: rupert murdoch and jerry hall marry in london
text: well , it 's certainly a nice sunny day for a wedding in central london - which is where media mogul rupert murdoch and actress-model jerry hall have just been married .
the ceremony took place at spencer house , just off green park .
murdoch , 84 , whose news uk company publishes the times and the sun , and 59-year-old hall will celebrate their marriage at st bride 's church , fleet street , tomorrow .
it 's the fourth marriage for murdoch and the first for hall , who has four children with mick jagger .
they posed for photographers outside spencer house , and a murdoch spokeswoman later confirmed the pair had married .
read more .

documents.title: greedo would n't have shot first , says jabba in script leak
text: when george lucas released remastered versions of the original star wars trilogy back in 1997 , fans were outraged over a key scene change .
the new version of episode iv suggested bounty hunter greedo had fired at a cornered han solo in the bar in mos eisley before solo delivered his own coup de grace and killed him .
but in the original it was clear that han fired the first and only shot .
apparently lucas did n't like it because it made han - played again by harrison ford in the force awakens ( above ) - look `` like a cold-blooded killer '' .

the incident sparked the phrase `` han shot first '' and now , in a tweet written by chewbacca actor peter mayhew , it seems that even baddie jabba the hut - who sent greedo on his mission to capture han - insists that his man would not have fired the first shot .
# chewscript 015 even jabba says greedo was n't going to shoot .
these scenes both ended up on the cutting room floor .

it 's amazing when you consider how good the finished product became .

documents.title: tickets on sale for viola beach tribute gig
text: tickets are on sale for a tribute concert is in memory of the four members of viola beach and their manager , who died in a car crash in sweden last month .
the concert , featuring performances from friends and bands they had played with , will be hosted by bbc radio 1 dj phil taggart .
it will take place in their home town of warrington on 2 april .
about 400 tickets are available with proceeds going to the men 's families .
read more .

documents.title: beyonce posts blue ivy internet loses its cool
text: beyonce has sent social media into meltdown after she posted very cute of her daughter blue ivy , taken during rehearsals for her super bowl half-time show .
the shots show the four-year old clowning around with the like of coldplay singer chris martin .
altogether now , awwwwww

documents.title: roger waters working on opera version of the wall
text: former pink floyd singer and bass player roger waters is to work with the montreal opera company in turning the concept album the wall into an opera .
the opera will debut in 2017 to mark the city 's 375th anniversary .
speaking at a news conference , waters said :

it had been my experience that experiments in collaboration between the worlds of rock and roll and the worlds of symphonic music were generally disastrous and should be embarked upon with extreme trepidation .
but they were extremely persuasive .
the 1979 album chronicles the life of a fictional rock star named pink who suffers a complete psychological breakdown .
waters last toured the album in 2010-2013 , earning nearly half a billion dollars .
la saison 2016/17 de l ' @ twitterid est lancee .
prevente : another brick in the wall >

documents.title: christian bale 'did n't quite nail ' batman
text: christian bale has admitted in a movie that he is disappointed with his performance as batman .
christopher nolan 's trilogy of films were credited with turning the franchise around from the critically-maligned val kilmer and george clooney years .
but , speaking to yahoo movies , christian said `` i did n't quite manage what i hoped i would throughout the trilogy .
`` chris did , but my own sense of self is like , 'i did n't quite nail it . ' ''
bale added that heath ledger 's performance as the joker in the dark knight also made him question his own performance .
he said : `` heath turned up , and just kind of completely ruined all my plans , .
`` because i went , 'he 's so much more interesting than me and what i 'm doing . ' ''
ledger , who died aged 28 in 2008 , prior to the film 's release , won an oscar for his role .

documents.title: bobbi kristina died from combination of drugs and immersion in water
text: bobbi kristina brown 's death was caused by a combination of immersion in water and drug intoxication .
the fulton county medical examiner 's office in atlanta released an initial statement ahead of releasing the full post-mortem report .
the 22-year-old daughter of singers whitney houston ( above ) and bobby brown was found face-down and unresponsive in her bathtub in january 2015 .
she died six months later in hospital .

documents.title: the feeling to tour with elo
text: the feeling have told the chris evans breakfast show on bbc radio 2 that they 're going on tour with jeff lynne 's elo , describing them as their `` musical heroes '' .
they told evans it was `` going to be amazing '' to be supporting the band .
elo 's tour kicks off on 5 april in liverpool .

documents.title: rula lenska banned from driving
text: former eastenders actress rula lenska has been banned from driving for 16 months after admitting drink driving .

wimbledon magistrates ' court heard she crashed her car , with her three-year-old grandson in the back seat , after having a drink of vodka with polish builders earlier that day to toast the completion of a fence at her home .
she clipped a parked car , flipping her ford kia on its side .
the court heard she was distracted by a warning light on her dashboard and feels genuine remorse over what happened .
seema parikh , representing lenska , said the actress had felt `` quite normal '' when she was asked to take the toddler home and has been riddled with guilt since the incident .
she was found to have 47 micrograms of alcohol per 100ml of her breath - the legal limit is 35 micrograms .
no one was injured in the accident .
lenska , who starred in celebrity big brother , was also fined £ 410 .

documents.title: ralph fiennes to star as richard iii
text: ralph fiennes is to star as richard iii at london 's almeida theatre in june .
vanessa redgrave will co-star in shakespeare 's history play , taking on the role of queen margaret .
she last appeared on stage in london in 2013 , in much ado about nothing , while fiennes is currently performing in the master builder at the old vic .
the names of the rest of the cast will be announced next month .
read more .
author: What's On Stage

documents.title: dvd release date for star wars : the force awakens
text: fans of star wars : the force awakens will soon be able to watch the sci-fi saga from the comfort of their own homes .
the film , which grossed $ 2.05bn ( £ 1.45bn ) internationally , is being released on dvd and blu-ray on 5 april in the us and 18 april in the uk .
the 3d version will come out later in the year .
as well as the film itself ( and if you 've not already seen it , where have you been ?
) , there will be bonus features including deleted scenes , interviews and footage from the making of the force awakens .
hopefully all that will keep people happy until star wars : episode viii , which is currently being filmed , is released in december 2017 .
read all the details .

documents.title: all saints release video for one strike
text: strap on your combat trousers , here 's the new video by re-reformed girlband all saints .
one strike , which premiered on radio 2 last week , was written by shaznay lewis after her band-mate nicole appleton went through a bitter divorce from oasis star liam gallagher .
the lyrics for one strike came from somewhere very real , '' she said .
`` nic was going through a lot of things at that time .
that was at the forefront of my mind because it was the heaviest thing going on . ''
the first few times i heard it in my car , i could n't stop crying '' added nicole 's older sister natalie .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: judge orders bobbi kristina brown post-mortem report to be unsealed
text: the post-mortem report into the death of singer whitney houston 's daughter bobbi kristina is to be made public after a judge in atlanta ordered it to be unsealed .

fulton county superior court judge henry newkirk granted a motion filed by media organizations who argued a sealing order granted in september was unconstitutional because there was no opportunity for a public hearing .
the 22-year-old daughter of whitney - who died in 2012 - and former husband bobby brown was found face-down in her bathtub in january last year .
she could not be revived and died in hospital in july .

documents.title: behind the curtains
text: a new collection of photographs that coincides with the 40th anniversary of the olivier awards gives a fascinating behind-the-scenes peek at london 's theatreland .
photographer matt humphrey and actor/director john schwab were given unprecedented access backstage to over 50 productions over the last year .

the productions include hamlet starring benedict cumberbatch at the barbican theatre , the audience starring kristin scott thomas at the apollo theatre and the national theatre 's musical wonder.land .
the photographs have been published in a book called curtain call : a year backstage in london theatre .
a selection of matt humphrey 's photographs are on display as part of the curtain up exhibition at london 's v & a museum until 31 august .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: big hero 6 to return as tv series
text: the oscar-winning animation big hero 6 is to return as tv series for disney xd .
it will continue the adventures of hiro and his robot baymax plus the rest of their team wasabi , honey lemon , fred and gogo .
according to digital spy , the superheroes will protect san fransokyo from scientifically-enhanced villains .
the series will be ready for 2017 .
author: Digital Spy

documents.title: music app launches
text: ever wanted to watch the radio 1 's live lounge on the go ?
do you want trevor nelson to put together a playlist for your next house party ?
do you like music in general ?
well , help is at hand as the bbc has just launched a new app that pulls together all the best performances , playlists , interviews and mixtapes from across the beeb .
importanrtly , you can personalise it - so radio 3 fans do n't end up listening to an endless loop of grime ( and vice versa ) .
details of how to download and set it up can be found on this handy page .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: mumford and sons hint at african album
text: rock band mumford and sons recently spent time in south africa , playing a series of shows with senegalese music legend baaba maal and south african pop band beatenberg .
the tour resulted in a single , there will be time , which gave the band their first ever south african number one .
now , the band have announced that baaba maal will join them at their upcoming hyde park show , and said `` further news '' of their recordings with the musician `` will be announced imminently . ''
other acts lined up for the gig , on 8 july , include alabama shakes , wolf alice , mystery jets , nick mulvey , the very best and beatenberg .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: neve campbell joins house of cards cast
text: canadian actress neve campbell has joined the cast of house of cards .
the 42-year-old plays lawyer leann harvey in the netflix political drama .
she told newsbeat : `` she is a strong , successful woman in her own right who is invited to help someone in their campaign this season .
i 'm not even allowed to say who . ''
the scream star said she had only watched four episodes of house of cards before being called to an audition - and then had to spend two days binge-watching it .
i have a child - a small child - who likes to watch things like daniel tiger 's neighbourhood , so i do n't get the tv to myself often .
but i thought it was fantastic and was really excited when i got to audition and then got the role .
series four of the house of cards is on netflix from today .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: sculptor to represent uk at venice biennale
text: sculptor phyllida barlow will represent britain at the 57th venice international art biennal next year .
the newcastle-born sculptor , who is known for her large installations ( see below ) , was recently made a cbe for services to art .
her solo show is being held at what is seen as the most important contemporary art festival in the world from 13 may to 26 november 2017 .
she said it was `` an extraordinary privilege and honour '' .
read more .

documents.title: get involved
text: if you missed out on yesterday 's live page , then check it out for the new ghostbusters trailer , news on trainspotting 2 and some great costumes for world book day .
so , have you listened to the new kendrick lamar album ?
will you be sad to see george leaving union j ?
if you have anything to tell us about today 's news agenda then , as ever , please tweet @ bbcnewsents or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: kendrick lamar releases surprise album overnight
text: fresh off the back of his five grammy awards , us rapper kendrick lamar has given fans a surprise album .
untitled unmastered is a an eight-track lp featuring outtakes from the recording session for his grammy-winning album to pimp a butterfly .
filled with jazz solos and politically-charged lyrics , it appears to be a companion piece to butterfly , rather than a standalone record .
all of the tracks are untitled , save for the date they were recorded .
strangely , its appearance appears to have been prompted by basketball star lebron james .

following kendrick 's incendiary grammy award performance - in which he debuted a verse that alluded to the 2012 death of 17-year-old trayvon martin - the sportsman tweeted the boss of the rapper 's record label demanding `` you have to release those untitled tracks asap !
untitled unmastered .

documents.title: george shelley leaves union j
text: i 'm a celebrity runner-up george shelley has apparently been 'kicked out ' of union j after the boy band gave him a final ultimatum by email .
former band mates josh cuthbert , jj hamblett and jaymi hensley told the sun that shelley had refused to commit to the group after returning from the australian jungle in december .
a spokesman for shelley said it was a `` mutual decision '' however and described the other members of the band as `` jealous '' .
the group had originally been called triple j and competed on the x factor in 2012 , where they met shelley and decided to continue as a foursome .
union j plan to replace the 22-year-old with a new fourth member .
perhaps they 'll go for someone else whose name begins with j this time ?
read more .

documents.title: good morning and welcome !
text: it 's friday !
how did that happen ?
we 'll be easing you into the weekend with all of the latest from the worlds of arts and entertainment .
today , that will include stories about a boyband rift and a new cast member for house of cards - and much , much more .
author: Lauren Turner
Entertainment Reporter
